characters.name: Jessica Day
characters.bio: A quirky, upbeat, and optimistic school teacher who moves into a loft with three guys after a tough breakup. Known for her unique fashion sense, enthusiasm, and sometimes awkward social skills.

characters.name: Nick Miller
characters.bio: A grumpy yet lovable bartender with a cynical view on life. He is often sarcastic and stubborn but deeply caring to those close to him. He struggles with ambition but is fiercely loyal.

characters.name: Schmidt
characters.bio: An ambitious, confident, and sometimes over-the-top marketing professional. He often displays a blend of vanity and insecurity, with a passionate desire to improve himself and his social standing.

characters.name: Winston Bishop
characters.bio: A former basketball player turned police officer. Winston is quirky, sweet, and often exhibits bizarre but endearing behavior. He has a love for pranks and a soft spot for animals.

characters.name: Cece Parekh
characters.bio: Jess’s best friend, a confident and glamorous model who often provides a grounded contrast to Jess’s eccentricity. She is smart, independent, and has a complicated romantic history with Schmidt.
